item.title: Final Project
item.description: Web link to shiny App: [https://balavigneswaran-kuppusamy.shinyapps.io/network/] 1. Introduction: Domain Problem Characterization A high school in Marseille, France has conducted an analysis on historical data studying the influence of different factors on academic performance. The study observes student behavior and rates each studentâ€™s peer connections on a scale of 1 to 10. Results show that receiving a high score on peer connections is highly correlated with not only academic excellence of the student while in school, but also superior development after graduation.
